council_profile.political_control: Labour majority (28 seats of 50). Conservative 16, Liberal Democrat 5, Reform 1.

ch_breach_spend.note: 12 current suppliers have Companies House compliance issues — highest of all 8 councils. Historical payments were made before breaches started.

split_payments.note: 4 instances detected. Split payment detection has a high false-positive rate.

year_end_pattern.note: Capital spent 5.2x their monthly average in March. Significant spike warrants scrutiny.

cross_council_context.price_gap_notes: Shared services arrangement with Chorley BC (£10.9M in cross-payments). Similar supplier base due to joint management structure.
